summary: changes the Hide Shield and Scaled Armor to Ancient Celt colors.
descriptionHtml:
Celtic Armor:

please download and give feedback so i can continue to improve this, if you like it endorse it too, if not, then point out the faults so i can fix \'em.

EDIT:

V1.1 is up, check the screenshot named \'update\' too see the difference.

had a request from CrazyWolfGamer to create a Celtic styled armor, and so far ALL my mods have been based on the stormcloak (City Guard) cuirass, so i thought i\'d make a change to that a re-texture the Hide Heavy Cuirass.

hope you all like it and as always im open to requests.

P.S.

The Blue and Gold Soldiers are from another of my mods, this one to be precise:

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3080

Callaghan04
author: Callaghan04
